name: Polar Sync
public_notice: Polar Sync has migrated from BSC to Ethereum. For more info, refer to their Medium article.

description.en: Polar Sync provides backend API solutions for applications to quickly and easily query data in real time from blockchains such as Binance Smart Chain, Ethereum, and more.
